com.datasalt.pangool.utils
Class DCUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.datasalt.pangool.utils.DCUtils

public class DCUtils
extends Object

This class contains useful methods for dealing with the Hadoop DistributedCache.

You can do things like saving a Java Serializable instance and recovering it afterwards. Check methods serializeToDC(Object, String, Configuration) and loadSerializedObjectInDC(Configuration, Class, String, boolean) for this purpose.

Method Detail

serializeToDC

public static void serializeToDC(Object obj,
                                 String serializeToLocalFile,
                                 Configuration conf)
                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                 IOException,
                                 URISyntaxException
Utility method for serializing an object and saving it in the Distributed Cache.

The file where it has been serialized will be saved into a Hadoop Configuration property so that you can call loadSerializedObjectInDC(Configuration, Class, String, boolean) to re-instantiate the serialized instance.

Parameters:
obj - The obj instance to serialize using Java serialization.
serializeToLocalFile - The local file where the instance will be serialized. It will be copied to the HDFS and removed.
conf - The Hadoop Configuration.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException
IOException
URISyntaxException

loadSerializedObjectInDC

public static <T> T loadSerializedObjectInDC(Configuration conf,
                                             Class<T> objClass,
                                             String fileName,
                                             boolean callSetConf)
                                  throws IOException
Given a Hadoop Configuration property and an Class, this method can re-instantiate an Object instance that was previously serialized and saved in the Distributed Cache like in serializeToDC(Object, String, Configuration).

Type Parameters:
T - The object type.
Parameters:
conf - The Hadoop Configuration.
objClass - The object type class.
fileName - The file name to locate in DC
callSetConf - If true, will call setConf() if deserialized object is Configurable
Throws:
IOException

locateFileInDC

public static Path locateFileInDC(Configuration conf,
                                  String filePostFix)
                           throws IOException
Given a file post-fix, locate a file in the DistributedCache. It iterates over all the local files and returns the first one that meets this condition.

Parameters:
conf - The Hadoop Configuration.
filePostFix - The file post-fix.
Throws:
IOException

cleanupTemporaryInstanceCache

public static void cleanupTemporaryInstanceCache(Configuration conf,
                                                 String prefix)
The methods of this class creates some temporary files for serializing instances. This method removes them.
